load_csv_maybe <- function(fp, ...) {
  if (file.exists(fp)) {
    data <- load_csv(fp, ...)
  } else {
    data <- NULL
  }
  data
}

drawtab <- function(df) {
  kableExtra::kable_styling(
    knitr::kable(df, digits = 3, row.names = FALSE, booktabs = TRUE))
}
